text: is the seventeenth single by Bump of Chicken, released on April 21, 2010, just 1 week after the preceding single "Happy." It was written just before Fujiwara turned 30, based on the concept of him talking to his younger self. It was also used by NHK's Minna no Uta between April and May 2010. ==Track listing== # - 6:22 # - 4:35 # (hidden track) ==Personnel== *Fujiwara Motoo — Guitar, vocals *Masukawa Hiroaki — Guitar *Naoi Yoshifumi — Bass *Masu Hideo — Drums ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable" |- !
